name: KV-2 3D SIMULATOR
description:
Take control of the KV-2 and win the battle.

- Realistic physics of penetration

- Realistic suspension physics

- Two Cards 1000x1000 meters

- Beautiful graphics

- Realistic sound (Shots, Engines)

- Various opponents (Pz.Kpfw. IV, Pz.Kpfw. III)

Control:

WASD - Movement

Space - Brake

Mouse 2 - Press to control the camera

Mouse 1 - Open fire

Shift - Aim Guns

R - Press 2 times to open the sight

Mouse 2 + Mouse Wheel - Change camera view
